channel.title: NPC DROP/PK points help
channel.description:
okai so in my PI server i have drops. THe choas elemental drops items but the Kbd and KQ dont. and i went into the config.java went to kbd drops and everything was there the item and it has 60 perfecent chance to drop but i never drops anything not even bones and thats 100 perfecnt please help.
also pkp when u buy an item from the shop it doesnt waste the pkp. help. like if i have 5 pkp and buy an item for 5 pkp i still have the 5 pkp

i fixed the drop but i need pkp help now.

item.title: NPC DROP/PK points help
item.dc:creator: @LearningToCode1 LearningToCode1
item.description:
@LearningToCode1 wrote:

If a monster has a drop ratio of 60 then you will only get drop’s every 60kills, You cannot have kbd having a 60kill drop ratio and then have bones on the same line as 100%, It’s just impossible.

And pkp, Something to do with your method’s like say when you open the shop it tell’s you how much pkp you have, You have to add another method under that telling the server to delete the set amount of the pkp, So that it goes down by that amount after buying the item with pkp.

Read full topic
